thread.title: Yuvraj Singh takes a dig at Zaheer Khan's rumoured girlfriend Sagarika Ghatage, ends up trolling himself
thread.title_full: Yuvraj Singh takes a dig at Zaheer Khan's rumoured girlfriend Sagarika Ghatage, ends up trolling himself - Sports

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Yuvraj Singh takes a dig at Zaheer Khan's rumoured girlfriend Sagarika Ghatage, ends up trolling himself
text:
Yuvraj Singh tries to take a dig at Bollywood actress and Zaheer Khan's rumoured girlfriend Sagarika Ghatge, but ends up falling into the pit himself. Was it deliberate?

(From left to right) Parthiv Patel, Yuvraj Singh, Sagarika Ghatge, Hazel Keech, Claudia Ciesla and Angad Bedi. Pic/Twitter 
If there is one current cricketer who is known for his wit after the 'Nawab of Twitter' Virender Sehwag, it's Yuvraj Singh. Yuvi, who has made a senstational comeback to the Indian limited overs side recently against England, often takes to Twitter to pull someone's leg.
Recently, Yuvi took to the social media platform to take a light-hearted dig at Bollywood actress Sagarika Ghatge.

Zaheer Khan and Sagarika Ghatge 
Now, Sagarika is rumoured to be Yuvi's former colleague Zaheer Khan's girlfriend, though both have yet to acknowledge the relationship.
Sagarika, burst on to the Bollywood scene with Shah Rukh Khan’s Chak De! India, but went quiet after that. She's back now with her new fim 'Irada'. The film which stars Naseeruddin Shah and Arshad Warsi released on February 17, and both Yuvraj and Zaheer were there in Mumbai to catch a special screening of the movie.
Yuvraj also wished Sagarika ahead of the screening. 

Zaheer Khan, Naseeruddin Shah, Ajit Agarkar and Ashish Nehra at the special screening of 'Irada'. Pic/Yogen Shah 
He thought that while wishing the actress, he would pull her leg a little as well. The southpaw posted, "All the best Sagarika Ghatge for tonight remember you from the days when you dated a Vice-captain of the Indian team good choice not do it in real life."
All the best @sagarikavghatge for tonight remember ufrom the days when u dated a v c of the Indian team good choice not do it in real life ðÂÂÂ pic.twitter.com/1Qq6TZ1WIh 
— yuvraj singh (@YUVSTRONG12) February 16, 2017 The newly-married cricketer was of course refering to Sagarika's character in 'Chak De! India', where she is shown dating the Vice-Captain of Indian cricket team, before dumping him.

Yuvraj Singh and Hazel Keech at the screening  
While supposedly pulling Sagarika's leg, he ends up trolling himself since he was the vice-captain of Team India for a  lng time and known for his playboy image. Is he thus alluding to that in the tweet? We wonder if he is saying that  Sagarika is lucky that she did not date him in real life.
Sagarika replied to the tweet with a straight bat. She posted,"I never intermingle reel with real . See you tonight."
Thank you @YUVSTRONG12 hahaha I never intermingle reel with real . See you tonight. https://t.co/YDnNtLuYoj 
— Sagarika Ghatge (@sagarikavghatge) February 16, 2017 But even this dig at himself seems to have made his fans swoon!
@YUVSTRONG12 @sagarikavghatge hahahahaha aur yeh outside the off stump moving very quickly away... ðÂÂÂðÂÂÂðÂÂÂ
— atul kasbekar (@atulkasbekar) February 16, 2017 
WHEN ZAK AND SAGARIKA WENT TO YUVi-HAZEL'S WEDDING RECEPTION TOGETHER: 

Zaheer Khan and Sagarika Ghatge attended Yuvraj Singh and Hazel Keech's wedding reception together
